item.title: DRH
item.description: score:-68 Chances: Wolfe Research initiated coverage of four hotel REITs this week, indicating potential opportunity in the sector. DiamondRock Hospitality Company is set to report financial results for the fourth quarter, providing insight into its performance. Comparable total revenues for DiamondRock Hospitality remain flat to 2022 and 12% higher than 2019, indicating potential stability and growth in the company.

item.title: LVS
item.description: score:175 Chances: Las Vegas Sands (LVS) fourth-quarter results are likely to reflect strong customer demand and robust spending. Las Vegas (LVS) is seeing favorable earnings estimate revision activity and has a positive Zacks Earnings ESP heading into earnings season. Improved visitation in Macao and Singapore and the expansion of non-gaming amenities will aid Las Vegas Sands (LVS).

item.title: HST
item.description: score:86 Chances: Recovery in group and business transient travel demand, capital-recycling efforts and healthy balance sheet strength are likely to drive Host Hotels’ performance in the quarters ahead. The pause in interest rate hikes and the likelihood of interest rate cuts in 2024 have generated strong appreciation of REITs, including Host Hotels, across multiple subsectors.
